OOC: Takes a book and smacks Rauq with it.

Hows that for hitting you with ideas?  Well anyway, I am still in the 
RPG, but am punished still so :(  And KSLawDogg quit, ouch!!!  Pain 
in my lower knee!!!  Now Rauq and rudra in charge, SCARY!!! j/j.  J/j 
about the j/j. I will try to get off of punishment as soon as 
posible, BTW idea.  Do you want to close down the RPG during the 
Holidays to give people time to think ant everything on how to 
improve the RPG and also cause its the holidays.
